# GET /v1/appCategories/{id}/relationships/parent | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/appCategories/{id}/relationships/parent ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appCategories-_id_-relationships-parent)

-  GET /v1/appCategories/{id}/relationships/parent 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/appCategories/{id}/relationships/parent

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appCategories-_id_-relationships-parent#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appCategories/{id}/relationships/parent
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appCategories-_id_-relationships-parent#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appCategories-_id_-relationships-parent#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppCategoryParentLinkageResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appcategoryparentlinkageresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appCategories-_id_-relationships-parent#see-also)

### [Reading App Category Information](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appCategories-_id_-relationships-parent#Reading-App-Category-Information)

[`Read App Category Information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appcategories-_id_)Get a specific app category.[`Read the Parent Information of an App Category`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appcategories-_id_-parent)Get the App Store category to which a specific subcategory belongs.
